name: markdown-editor
title: MEME - Moerills Efficacious Markdown Editor [BETA]
description:
This module is currently in beta!
This module replaces the default text editor TinyMCE with a markdown editor.
For important information, full list of features and a list of keyboard shortcuts, visit the projects page.
Please also use the github repo linked above, to provide feedback or for bug reporting.
author: Moerill
